<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Terrifying Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2153) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

The spells of those you have [Demoralized](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) are less effective on you. If you succeed in Demoralizing a creature, for the next 24 hours you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against that creature's spells.
name: Terrifying Resistance
